subject: Football (College)
Football
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Football was abandoned at the University of Chicago from 1939 to 1969 for being an “infernal nuisance,” but is thriving again, in its own measured terms.
snippet: Football was abandoned at the University of Chicago from 1939 to 1969 for being an “infernal nuisance,” but is thriving again, in its own measured terms.
